text: nætahot (movunge upamava) ghana andhakarayenda, gigirumenda, viduliyenda yut valakulen vasina varsavata hasu vunu (ayage upamavata sama vanneya. ese hasu vunu) movun, hena handin marana biyata patva, tamange atængili tamange kanvalata ætulu kara (tada kara, vasa) gannaha. namut allah, pratiksepa karana movunva (sæma vitama) vatakara genama sitinneya
